rules_text:
Create a 3/2 black Homunculus creature token. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, create two of those tokens instead.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Nothing more than mere puppets injected with Philosopher's Stones.”
—Envy, the Jealous[/i]
